description.setup: Stand on band with feet shoulder-width. Hold handles with palms facing thighs. Arms at sides, slight elbow bend.
description.movement: Raise arms forward to shoulder height, maintaining slight elbow bend. Pause at top. Lower with control against band resistance.
description.cues: Lead with knuckles, stop at shoulder height, control descent, no momentum

description.overview: A glute bridge with band resistance above knees for added hip abduction challenge. Targets glutes and teaches proper hip extension with external rotation.
description.setup: Lie on back, loop band above knees. Feet flat, hip-width apart. Arms at sides, palms down.
description.movement: Press knees out against band while driving hips to ceiling. Squeeze glutes at top, maintaining outward knee pressure. Lower with control.
description.cues: Press knees out, squeeze glutes hard, don't hyperextend back, control descent

description.overview: A neutral-grip curl using bands targeting biceps and brachialis. Provides constant tension throughout range of motion for forearm and arm development.
description.setup: Stand on center of band, feet shoulder-width. Hold handles with palms facing each other (neutral grip). Arms at sides.
description.movement: Curl handles toward shoulders keeping palms facing each other throughout. Squeeze at top. Lower with control.
description.cues: Palms stay neutral, elbows pinned, squeeze at top, slow negative

description.overview: An explosive pulling movement targeting upper back, traps, and rear delts. Builds power and upper back thickness with band resistance.
description.setup: Stand on center of band, feet shoulder-width. Hold handles in front of thighs, palms facing body. Slight knee bend.
description.movement: Explosively pull handles to chin height, driving elbows high and wide. Lead with elbows, not hands. Lower with control.
description.cues: Elbows lead, chin height, explosive pull, control descent

description.overview: A vertical pulling exercise using anchored band to target lats and biceps. Mimics cable lat pulldown for back width development.
description.setup: Anchor band overhead. Kneel or stand facing anchor. Grasp band with overhand grip wider than shoulders. Arms extended overhead.
description.movement: Pull band down to upper chest, driving elbows to ribs. Squeeze lats at bottom. Return arms overhead with control.
description.cues: Pull elbows to ribs, chest up, squeeze lats, control return

description.overview: A lateral shoulder raise using band resistance for constant tension. Targets middle deltoids for shoulder width and definition.
description.setup: Stand on center of band, feet together. Hold handles at sides, palms facing in. Slight elbow bend.
description.movement: Raise arms out to sides until parallel with floor. Lead with elbows slightly. Lower with control against band tension.
description.cues: Lead with elbows, stop at shoulder height, control descent, no momentum

description.overview: A lateral movement exercise with band around legs targeting hip abductors and glutes. Builds hip stability and strengthens gluteus medius.
description.setup: Place band around ankles or above knees. Feet shoulder-width apart, slight squat position. Hands on hips or in front.
description.movement: Step laterally with one foot, then follow with other foot maintaining band tension. Continue in one direction, then reverse.
description.cues: Stay in squat, tension constant, controlled steps, don't let knees cave

description.overview: A prone hamstring curl using band anchored at ankle. Isolates hamstrings with constant tension for posterior thigh development.
description.setup: Anchor band low, loop around ankle. Lie prone on floor or bench. Starting leg extended toward anchor.
description.movement: Curl heel toward glute by flexing knee. Squeeze hamstring at top. Extend leg with control against band resistance.
description.cues: Squeeze hamstring, full range, control extension, hips stay down

description.overview: A seated quadricep extension using band resistance. Isolates quads with accommodating resistance for knee extension strength.
description.setup: Sit on chair or bench, anchor band behind you at low point. Loop band around ankle. Start with knee bent.
description.movement: Extend knee to straighten leg against band resistance. Squeeze quad at top. Return to start with control.
description.cues: Squeeze quad at top, full extension, control descent, stable upper body

description.overview: A forward diagonal walking pattern with band around legs. Targets hip abductors and glutes with multi-directional challenge.
description.setup: Place band around ankles or above knees. Athletic stance, slight squat. Feet shoulder-width, maintaining band tension.
description.movement: Step forward and outward diagonally with one foot. Follow with other foot maintaining stance width. Continue forward in alternating monster walk pattern.
description.cues: Diagonal steps, stay low, maintain tension, knees track over toes

description.overview: An anti-rotation core exercise pressing band away from chest while resisting rotational pull. Builds core stability and rotational strength.
description.setup: Anchor band at chest height to side. Stand perpendicular to anchor. Hold band handle at chest with both hands. Feet shoulder-width.
description.movement: Press hands straight out from chest, resisting band's pull to rotate torso. Hold briefly at full extension. Return to chest with control.
description.cues: Resist rotation, brace core, press straight, don't let band pull you

description.overview: A horizontal pulling exercise targeting rear delts and upper back. Essential for shoulder health, posture, and counteracting forward shoulder position.
description.setup: Hold band in front with arms extended, shoulder-width or narrower grip. Palms down or neutral. Shoulders back and down.
description.movement: Pull band apart by squeezing shoulder blades together, arms moving out to sides. Pause at full stretch. Return with control.
description.cues: Squeeze shoulder blades, arms stay straight, chest up, control return

description.overview: A bent-over reverse fly using band resistance for rear deltoid isolation. Targets posterior shoulders and upper back for balanced shoulder development.
description.setup: Stand on center of band or anchor at low point. Hinge at hips to near-parallel. Cross band handles, arms hanging down.
description.movement: Raise arms out to sides in arc motion until parallel with floor. Squeeze rear delts at top. Lower with control.
description.cues: Lead with elbows, squeeze rear delts, maintain hip hinge, control descent

description.overview: An overhand grip curl using band resistance targeting brachioradialis and forearm extensors. Builds forearm strength and grip.
description.setup: Stand on center of band, feet shoulder-width. Hold handles with palms facing down (pronated). Arms at sides.
description.movement: Curl handles toward shoulders while maintaining overhand grip. Squeeze forearms and biceps at top. Lower with control.
description.cues: Palms stay down, elbows pinned, squeeze at top, control negative

description.overview: A seated horizontal row using band anchored at foot level. Targets lats, rhomboids, and biceps for back thickness.
description.setup: Sit on floor, legs extended. Loop band around feet or anchor low. Hold handles with arms extended. Sit tall, chest up.
description.movement: Pull handles to lower ribs, driving elbows back. Squeeze shoulder blades together at end. Extend arms with control.
description.cues: Elbows to ribs, squeeze shoulder blades, chest stays up, control extension

description.overview: A vertical pressing exercise using band resistance for shoulder development. Targets all three deltoid heads with accommodating resistance.
description.setup: Stand on center of band, feet shoulder-width. Hold handles at shoulder height, palms forward. Core braced.
description.movement: Press handles overhead until arms fully extended. Keep core tight to prevent arching. Lower to shoulders with control.
description.cues: Press straight up, full lockout, core tight, control descent

description.overview: A bodyweight squat with band resistance for added lower body challenge. Provides accommodating resistance that increases at top of movement.
description.setup: Stand on center of band, feet shoulder-width. Hold handles at shoulders or loop band behind neck. Core braced.
description.movement: Push hips back and squat down, keeping chest up. Descend until thighs parallel. Drive through heels to stand against band resistance.
description.cues: Knees track toes, chest up, drive through heels, squeeze glutes at top

description.overview: A standing horizontal row using anchored band for back development. Targets lats, rhomboids, and biceps with constant tension.
description.setup: Anchor band at chest height in front of you. Hold handles with arms extended. Step back to create tension. Athletic stance.
description.movement: Pull handles to lower ribs, driving elbows back. Squeeze shoulder blades at end position. Extend arms with control.
description.cues: Pull to ribs, squeeze back, stay stable, control return

description.overview: A tricep isolation exercise using band anchored overhead. Targets all three tricep heads with constant band tension.
description.setup: Anchor band overhead. Face anchor, grasp band with both hands at chest height. Elbows at sides, upper arms stationary.
description.movement: Extend elbows to push band down until arms straight. Squeeze triceps at bottom. Return to start with control, elbows stationary.
description.cues: Elbows pinned, full extension, squeeze triceps, control return

description.overview: A rotational core exercise using anchored band in diagonal chopping pattern. Builds rotational power and core strength.
description.setup: Anchor band at high point to side. Stand perpendicular, feet wider than shoulders. Hold handle with both hands near anchor side shoulder.
description.movement: Rotate torso and pull band diagonally down and across body to opposite hip. Control return to start. Complete reps then switch sides.
description.cues: Rotate from core, arms follow torso, controlled chop, pivot back foot

description.overview: An advanced unilateral push-up variation with one arm extended to side. Increases load on working arm while developing strength asymmetry for one-arm push-up progression.
description.setup: Wide push-up position, hands much wider than shoulders. One hand points forward, other points to side. Body straight, core tight.
description.movement: Lower toward forward hand, extending other arm out straight. Push back up through forward hand. Alternate sides or complete set on one side.
description.cues: Lower to working hand, extend support arm, push through palm, stay rigid

description.overview: A quadruped locomotion pattern crawling forward on hands and feet. Builds total body coordination, core stability, and shoulder endurance.
description.setup: Hands under shoulders, knees under hips lifted 2 inches off ground. Back flat, core braced. Looking slightly ahead.
description.movement: Move opposite hand and foot forward simultaneously. Alternate sides, keeping knees low and back flat. Crawl forward for distance or time.
description.cues: Knees hover low, opposite hand and foot, flat back, controlled crawl

description.overview: An explosive horizontal jump for maximum distance. Develops lower body power, hip extension strength, and athletic jumping ability.
description.setup: Stand with feet hip-width apart, toes near starting line. Arms back in athletic ready position. Slight knee bend.
description.movement: Swing arms forward while explosively jumping forward. Extend hips fully mid-air. Land softly with bent knees, absorbing impact.
description.cues: Arm swing drives jump, full extension, stick the landing, reset each rep

description.overview: A sit-up variation with soles of feet together in butterfly position. Reduces hip flexor involvement to better isolate abdominals.
description.setup: Lie on back, soles of feet together, knees out to sides in butterfly. Arms overhead touching floor or across chest.
description.movement: Contract abs to curl torso up, reaching past feet or touching toes. Lower back down with control, arms returning overhead.
description.cues: Curl up with abs, reach past feet, control descent, knees stay open

description.overview: A reverse quadruped locomotion moving face-up on hands and feet. Builds shoulder stability, tricep endurance, and hip flexibility.
description.setup: Sit on floor, hands behind hips, fingers forward. Feet flat, knees bent. Lift hips off ground to table-top position.
description.movement: Walk backward or forward by moving opposite hand and foot. Maintain elevated hip position throughout. Move for distance or time.
description.cues: Hips stay up, opposite hand and foot, fingers forward, steady pace

description.overview: A quadruped glute isolation exercise kicking leg back and up. Targets gluteus maximus with focused hip extension movement.
description.setup: Hands under shoulders, knees under hips on all fours. Core braced, back flat. Neck neutral.
description.movement: Drive one heel toward ceiling, keeping knee bent at 90 degrees. Squeeze glute at top. Lower with control without touching floor. Complete reps then switch.
description.cues: Drive heel to ceiling, squeeze glute, don't arch back, control descent

description.overview: A prone back extension performed on floor targeting erector spinae. Builds lower back strength and endurance for spine stability.
description.setup: Lie face down, hands beside shoulders or at temples. Legs extended, tops of feet on floor. Core engaged.
description.movement: Lift chest off floor by contracting lower back muscles. Keep neck neutral, looking at floor ahead. Lower with control.
description.cues: Lift with back muscles, neutral neck, don't hyperextend, control descent

description.overview: A supine core exercise alternating small leg kicks. Targets lower abs and hip flexors while building muscular endurance.
description.setup: Lie on back, hands under hips or at sides. Lift legs few inches off floor, legs straight. Lower back pressed into floor.
description.movement: Alternate small up and down kicks with each leg in flutter pattern. Maintain constant leg elevation and core engagement throughout.
description.cues: Low back down, small kicks, legs straight, constant motion

description.overview: A glute bridge variation with soles of feet together in frog position. Maximizes glute activation by externally rotating hips.
description.setup: Lie on back, soles of feet together, knees fallen out to sides. Arms at sides, palms down. Heels close to glutes.
description.movement: Drive through heels to lift hips, squeezing glutes hard at top. Maintain external hip rotation throughout. Lower with control.
description.cues: Drive through heels, squeeze glutes hard, keep knees out, short range

description.overview: A supine oblique exercise reaching alternately toward each heel. Targets obliques through lateral flexion with constant ab engagement.
description.setup: Lie on back, knees bent, feet flat on floor hip-width apart. Arms at sides, palms down. Lift shoulders slightly off floor, engaging abs.
description.movement: Laterally flex spine to reach one hand toward same-side heel. Return to center and reach to other side. Alternate continuously.
description.cues: Shoulders stay up, side bend to reach, maintain ab tension, smooth alternation

description.overview: An isometric core exercise holding curved hollow position. Fundamental gymnastics hold developing anterior core strength and total body tension.
description.setup: Lie on back, arms overhead, legs extended. Press lower back firmly into floor. Lift shoulders and legs off ground.
description.movement: Hold curved hollow position with only lower back touching floor. Arms and legs extended, creating banana shape. Breathe while maintaining position.
description.cues: Low back glued down, curve like a banana, squeeze everything, breathe steady

description.overview: A dynamic warm-up exercise walking hands out to plank and walking feet back. Builds hamstring flexibility, core stability, and shoulder endurance.
description.setup: Stand with feet hip-width apart, arms at sides. Hinge forward to place hands on floor in front of feet.
description.movement: Walk hands forward to plank position. Hold briefly, then walk feet toward hands keeping legs straight. Stand and repeat.
description.cues: Straight legs on walk-in, maintain plank in middle, controlled pace, reach forward

description.overview: A horizontal pull performed hanging beneath a bar or rings. Develops back strength and teaches scapular control for pull-up progression.
description.setup: Hang beneath bar with overhand grip, arms extended. Body straight from head to heels at angle. Heels on ground.
description.movement: Pull chest to bar by driving elbows back and squeezing shoulder blades. Lower with control to full arm extension.
description.cues: Pull chest to bar, squeeze shoulder blades, stay rigid, control descent

description.overview: An explosive plyometric lunge switching legs mid-air. Builds lower body power, single-leg strength, and cardiovascular conditioning.
description.setup: Start in lunge position, one foot forward, back knee near floor. Arms in running position. Core braced.
description.movement: Explosively jump up, switching legs mid-air. Land softly in lunge with opposite leg forward. Immediately spring into next rep.
description.cues: Explode vertically, switch mid-air, land soft, stay upright

description.overview: An advanced single-leg squat to full depth. Requires exceptional strength, balance, and mobility. Ultimate bodyweight leg exercise.
description.setup: Stand on one leg, other leg extended forward. Arms out front for counterbalance. Core tight.
description.movement: Lower slowly on one leg, extending other leg forward. Descend to full depth, control at bottom. Drive up through heel to stand.
description.cues: Control descent, full depth, counterbalance with arms, drive through heel

description.overview: A prone shoulder exercise lifting arms straight forward in I-position. Targets lower traps and improves overhead shoulder mobility.
description.setup: Lie face down on floor, arms extended straight overhead. Thumbs up, forehead resting on floor. Core engaged.
description.movement: Lift both arms off floor keeping them in line with ears. Squeeze lower traps at top. Lower with control.
description.cues: Arms by ears, thumbs up, squeeze lower traps, controlled movement

description.overview: A prone shoulder exercise forming W-shape with arms. Targets external rotators, rhomboids, and lower traps for rotator cuff strength.
description.setup: Lie face down, elbows bent at 90 degrees, upper arms at shoulder level forming W. Forehead on floor.
description.movement: Lift elbows and hands off floor maintaining W-position. Squeeze between shoulder blades. Lower with control.
description.cues: Maintain W-shape, squeeze shoulder blades, elbows stay bent, controlled movement

description.overview: A lateral jumping exercise mimicking skating motion. Builds lateral power, single-leg stability, and hip strength.
description.setup: Stand on one leg, opposite leg behind and across. Slight forward lean, arms ready for counterbalance.
description.movement: Push off laterally, jumping to land on opposite leg. Sweep other leg behind. Absorb landing, then immediately push off to other side.
description.cues: Push laterally, land soft, absorb on one leg, continuous motion

description.overview: An isometric squat variation with small pulsing movements at bottom. Builds muscular endurance and time under tension in quads and glutes.
description.setup: Feet shoulder-width apart, toes slightly out. Lower to bottom of squat, thighs parallel or below. Arms forward for balance.
description.movement: Make small up and down pulses, staying in bottom portion of squat. Move only a few inches. Maintain position for time or reps.
description.cues: Stay low, small pulses, don't come up fully, burn the quads

description.overview: A burpee variation without the jump, moving between squat and plank. Builds conditioning and full-body coordination at lower intensity than burpees.
description.setup: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, arms at sides. Ready to move through multiple positions.
description.movement: Squat down, place hands on floor. Jump feet back to plank position. Jump feet forward to hands. Stand up. Repeat continuously.
description.cues: Hands down, feet back, feet forward, stand up, stay rhythmic

description.overview: An explosive full-body jump spreading arms and legs like a star. Builds explosive power and elevates heart rate for conditioning.
description.setup: Stand with feet together, arms at sides. Slight knee bend, ready to explode upward.
description.movement: Jump explosively, spreading arms and legs wide to form star shape mid-air. Land with feet together, absorbing impact softly.
description.cues: Explode up, spread wide, land soft, reset each rep

description.overview: A prone exercise alternating opposite arm and leg lifts mimicking swimming. Strengthens posterior chain and improves coordination.
description.setup: Lie face down, arms extended overhead, legs straight. Forehead near floor, neck neutral.
description.movement: Lift opposite arm and leg simultaneously while lowering the others. Alternate continuously in swimming pattern. Keep movements controlled.
description.cues: Opposite arm and leg, continuous motion, stay long, control pace

description.overview: An advanced ab exercise folding body into V-shape. Targets entire rectus abdominis with high-intensity simultaneous lift of torso and legs.
description.setup: Lie flat on back, arms extended overhead, legs straight. Lower back pressed into floor.
description.movement: Simultaneously lift legs and torso, reaching hands toward toes to form V-shape. Balance briefly on tailbone. Lower with control.
description.cues: Lift together, reach for toes, balance on tailbone, control descent

description.overview: A push-up variation with wider hand placement emphasizing chest activation. Reduces tricep involvement while increasing pectoral stretch and engagement.
description.setup: High plank position, hands significantly wider than shoulder width. Fingers pointed forward or slightly out. Body straight.
description.movement: Lower body toward floor, keeping elbows tracking toward hands. Chest leads the descent. Push back to start, squeezing chest.
description.cues: Wide hands, elbows toward hands, chest leads, squeeze on push

description.overview: A shoulder press variation rotating from palms-in to palms-out. Hits all three deltoid heads through rotation while pressing for complete shoulder development.
description.setup: Sit or stand with dumbbells at shoulder height, palms facing you. Elbows in front of body. Core braced.
description.movement: Press dumbbells up while rotating palms to face forward at top. Reverse motion on descent, rotating palms back to face you at bottom.
description.cues: Rotate as you press, full lockout, reverse the rotation, controlled tempo

description.overview: A bent-over isolation exercise targeting rear deltoids with dumbbells. Essential for balanced shoulder development and posterior shoulder strength.
description.setup: Stand with feet hip-width, hinge at hips to near-parallel. Dumbbells hanging below chest, slight elbow bend. Back flat.
description.movement: Raise dumbbells out to sides in arc until arms parallel with floor. Squeeze rear delts at top. Lower with control.
description.cues: Lead with elbows, squeeze at top, maintain hip hinge, control descent

description.overview: A burpee combined with dumbbell snatch. High-intensity full-body movement combining push-up, jump, and overhead press for conditioning.
description.setup: Stand with dumbbells at sides. Ready for burpee movement with dumbbells.
description.movement: Place dumbbells on floor, jump back to plank, push-up, jump feet forward. Swing dumbbells between legs and snatch overhead in one motion. Lower and repeat.
description.cues: Burpee with dumbbells, swing through legs, powerful hip drive, full lockout overhead

description.overview: An explosive pulling movement bringing dumbbells from hang to shoulder catch. Builds total body power and teaches hip drive mechanics.
description.setup: Stand with feet hip-width, dumbbells at sides or hanging in front. Slight knee bend, chest up.
description.movement: Explosively extend hips and shrug, pulling dumbbells up body. Rotate elbows under to catch dumbbells at shoulders. Lower with control.
description.cues: Hip drive first, shrug and pull, fast elbows, soft catch

description.overview: A complex full-body exercise combining push-up, rows, clean, and thruster. Ultimate conditioning movement targeting all major muscle groups.
description.setup: Stand with dumbbells at sides. Ready to move through multiple positions.
description.movement: Place dumbbells, jump to plank, push-up, row each side, jump feet forward, clean dumbbells to shoulders, squat and press overhead. Lower and repeat.
description.cues: Push-up, row, row, clean, squat, press - one fluid sequence

description.overview: A prone shoulder exercise with dumbbells forming W-shape. Targets rotator cuff and rear deltoids for shoulder stability and health.
description.setup: Lie face down on incline bench or floor. Light dumbbells in hands, elbows bent at 90 degrees forming W.
description.movement: Lift dumbbells by elevating elbows and hands, maintaining W-position. Squeeze shoulder blades at top. Lower with control.
description.cues: Maintain W-shape, light weight, squeeze between shoulder blades, controlled movement

description.overview: An explosive single-arm movement taking dumbbell from floor to overhead. Builds total body power, coordination, and shoulder stability.
description.setup: Stand over dumbbell between feet, squat down to grip it. Chest up, back flat, one arm on dumbbell.
description.movement: Explosively extend hips and pull dumbbell up body close to torso. Punch overhead to lockout in one motion. Lower with control.
description.cues: Hip drive, pull close to body, punch to lockout, catch with straight arm

description.overview: A unilateral carry walking with weight in one hand. Builds grip strength, core stability, and anti-lateral flexion strength.
description.setup: Stand tall with heavy dumbbell in one hand. Shoulder packed, opposite side engaged to stay upright.
description.movement: Walk with controlled steps, maintaining upright posture. Don't lean toward or away from weight. Walk for distance, switch hands.
description.cues: Stay tall, don't lean, controlled steps, grip hard

description.overview: A chest-supported row variation using incline bench. Eliminates lower back strain while isolating lats and rhomboids.
description.setup: Lie chest-down on incline bench. Dumbbells hanging below with arms extended. Feet on floor for stability.
description.movement: Row dumbbells to sides of ribcage, squeezing shoulder blades. Lower with control to full extension.
description.cues: Squeeze shoulder blades, pull to ribs, chest stays on bench, control descent

description.overview: A push-up variation with feet elevated on box or bench. Increases upper chest and shoulder emphasis while adding difficulty.
description.setup: Hands on floor, feet on box or bench. Body straight from head to heels. Hands slightly wider than shoulders.
description.movement: Lower body toward floor, keeping body rigid. Descend until chest nearly touches floor. Push back up to start.
description.cues: Stay rigid, chest to floor, push through palms, core tight throughout

description.overview: A unilateral hip hinge challenging balance and posterior chain. Builds hamstring strength while improving proprioception and core stability.
description.setup: Stand on one leg, slight knee bend. Weight in opposite hand or both hands. Free leg ready to extend back.
description.movement: Hinge forward as back leg extends behind. Maintain straight line from head to heel. Return with control.
description.cues: Hips stay square, reach back with heel, feel hamstring stretch, controlled tempo

description.overview: Unilateral glute bridge targeting one side at a time. Addresses strength imbalances while building glute and hamstring strength.
description.setup: Lying on back, one foot planted, other leg extended or bent up. Arms at sides for stability.
description.movement: Drive through planted heel to lift hips up. Squeeze glute hard at top. Lower with control.
description.cues: Drive through heel, big glute squeeze, hips stay level, feel the working side

description.overview: Unilateral deadlift challenging balance and posterior chain. Builds hamstring strength while improving proprioception.
description.setup: Standing on one leg with weight in opposite hand. Free leg ready to extend behind.
description.movement: Hinge forward extending free leg back. Maintain straight line from head to heel. Drive up with control.
description.cues: Hips stay square, straight line head to heel, feel hamstring working, controlled balance

description.overview: Romanian deadlift performed on one leg. Challenges balance while building unilateral posterior chain strength.
description.setup: Standing on one leg, weight in opposite or same hand. Free leg ready to extend back.
description.movement: Hinge forward as back leg extends. Feel hamstring stretch in standing leg. Return with control.
description.cues: Hips hinge back, feel standing leg hamstring, balance and control, straight line

description.overview: A unilateral rowing movement for back development. Allows heavy loading while providing stability, excellent for addressing imbalances.
description.setup: One hand and knee on bench, other foot planted wide. Flat back, dumbbell hanging straight down.
description.movement: Row dumbbell to hip, elbow close to body. Squeeze lat at top. Control the stretch at bottom.
description.cues: Elbow to hip, pull with back not arm, pause at top, stretch at bottom

description.overview: Complex exercise combining unilateral carry with lunge. Challenges core stability, coordination, and full-body strength.
description.setup: Weight locked out overhead in one hand. Other hand free. Ready for controlled movement.
description.movement: Hold weight overhead while performing reverse lunges. Maintain overhead position throughout. Switch arms.
description.cues: Weight stays overhead, core stays tight, controlled lunges, don't let weight drift

description.overview: A dumbbell pressing movement allowing greater range of motion than barbell. Builds chest while improving stability and addressing imbalances.
description.setup: Dumbbells at chest level, palms forward. Shoulder blades retracted, feet planted.
description.movement: Press dumbbells up and together in arc motion. Control the deeper stretch at bottom. Squeeze at top.
description.cues: Arc motion not straight up, deep stretch, press and squeeze, control the weights

description.overview: A vertical pressing movement with dumbbells for shoulder development. Allows natural movement path and addresses strength imbalances between sides.
description.setup: Dumbbells at shoulder height, palms forward or neutral. Core braced, standing or seated.
description.movement: Press dumbbells overhead in slight arc. Weights come together at top. Control descent to shoulders.
description.cues: Press up and in, core stays tight, smooth arc path, control down

description.overview: An isolation exercise for bicep development using dumbbells. Allows supination through range of motion and addresses arm imbalances.
description.setup: Dumbbells at sides, palms forward or neutral start. Elbows at sides, shoulders back.
description.movement: Curl weights up with control, rotating palms up if starting neutral. Squeeze at top. Lower slowly.
description.cues: Elbows stay put, control the negative, full squeeze, no swinging

description.overview: A combination squat to overhead press in one fluid motion. Builds full-body power, conditioning, and coordination while challenging multiple muscle groups.
description.setup: Dumbbells at shoulders, elbows forward. Feet shoulder-width, ready to squat.
description.movement: Squat down with control. Drive up explosively, using momentum to press dumbbells overhead. One smooth motion.
description.cues: Use the bounce, smooth transition, full lockout, breathe at top

description.overview: Traditional crunch with dumbbell for added resistance. Builds rectus abdominis strength through loaded flexion.
description.setup: Lying on back with knees bent. Dumbbell held at chest or behind head. Lower back neutral.
description.movement: Crunch up by flexing spine while holding weight. Feel abs contract. Lower with control.
description.cues: Flex the spine, feel abs working, control the weight, breathe out on crunch

description.overview: Burpee variation holding dumbbells throughout movement. Increases difficulty and adds upper body loading.
description.setup: Standing with dumbbells at sides. Clear space for movement. Ready for high-intensity work.
description.movement: Perform burpee while holding dumbbells. Squat, jump back, push-up optional, jump forward, stand with press.
description.cues: Keep dumbbells throughout, controlled movements, explosive transitions, maintain form

description.overview: Arc movement targeting lats and chest with serratus involvement. Unique exercise bridging upper body muscle groups.
description.setup: Lying across bench with shoulders on pad. Dumbbell held overhead with both hands. Hip sag for lat stretch.
description.movement: Lower weight in arc behind head feeling lat stretch. Pull back over chest using lats and chest.
description.cues: Big arc motion, feel lat stretch, sag hips slightly, pull with lats and chest

description.overview: Chest pressing exercise using dumbbells on bench. Allows greater range of motion and unilateral development.
description.setup: Dumbbells at chest level, lying on bench. Shoulder blades retracted, feet planted.
description.movement: Press dumbbells up and slightly together in arc motion. Lower to chest level with control.
description.cues: Arc motion up and together, deeper stretch than barbell, control heavy dumbbells

description.overview: An explosive pulling movement from hip to chin targeting traps, rear delts, and upper back. Builds power and muscle thickness in the upper posterior chain.
description.setup: Stand with feet shoulder-width, dumbbells hanging in front of thighs. Slight knee bend, hips back slightly. Chest up.
description.movement: Explosively drive hips forward while pulling dumbbells to chin height. Lead with elbows high and wide. Lower with control and reset.
description.cues: Elbows high and wide, explosive hip drive, chin height, control the descent

description.overview: A vertical pulling exercise raising dumbbells to chin height. Targets traps and lateral delts for upper back and shoulder development.
description.setup: Stand with feet hip-width, dumbbells in front of thighs. Palms facing body, slight grip width.
description.movement: Pull dumbbells up toward chin, leading with elbows. Elbows go high and wide. Lower with control.
description.cues: Elbows lead, chin height, high and wide, control descent

description.overview: A bent-over pulling exercise targeting rear delts and upper back with external rotation. Builds shoulder health and postural strength.
description.setup: Stand with feet hip-width, hinge at hips. Dumbbells hanging below chest, palms facing back.
description.movement: Pull dumbbells toward face, driving elbows high and wide. Externally rotate at top. Lower with control.
description.cues: Elbows high and wide, external rotation, squeeze at top, maintain hip hinge

description.overview: A bent-over alternating row from deep squat position. Targets lats and rhomboids while challenging hip mobility and core stability.
description.setup: Wide stance over two dumbbells, deep squat position. Hands on dumbbells, chest up, back flat.
description.movement: Row one dumbbell to hip while pressing other into floor for stability. Lower and switch sides. Alternate continuously.
description.cues: Stay low in squat, row to hip, press down for stability, alternate smoothly

description.overview: A pressing exercise performed lying on floor limiting range of motion. Builds lockout strength and is shoulder-friendly chest pressing option.
description.setup: Lie on floor, knees bent, feet flat. Dumbbells at chest, elbows on floor at 45 degrees.
description.movement: Press dumbbells straight up until arms extended. Lower until triceps touch floor. Pause briefly, then press.
description.cues: Elbows touch floor, pause at bottom, press straight up, squeeze at top

description.overview: A lying tricep extension lowering dumbbells to temples. Isolates triceps through full range for arm development.
description.setup: Lie on bench, dumbbells held with arms extended over chest. Palms facing each other, elbows pointed up.
description.movement: Lower dumbbells by bending elbows toward temples. Keep upper arms stationary. Press back up, squeezing triceps.
description.cues: Elbows stationary, lower to temples, squeeze at top, control descent

description.overview: A bent-over tricep isolation exercise extending arm behind body. Targets triceps at peak contraction for arm development.
description.setup: Hinge forward at hips, one hand on bench for support. Dumbbell in other hand, upper arm parallel to floor.
description.movement: Extend elbow to straighten arm behind you. Squeeze tricep at full extension. Lower with control without dropping elbow.
description.cues: Upper arm stays still, squeeze at extension, control descent, full straighten

description.overview: A tricep isolation exercise pressing dumbbell overhead. Targets long head of triceps through full stretch and contraction.
description.setup: Stand or sit, hold one dumbbell overhead with both hands cupping one end. Arms extended, elbows by ears.
description.movement: Lower dumbbell behind head by bending elbows. Feel stretch in triceps. Press back to start, squeezing triceps at top.
description.cues: Elbows stay by ears, full stretch, squeeze at top, control descent

description.overview: An isolation exercise raising dumbbells out to sides. Primary exercise for building middle deltoid width and shoulder definition.
description.setup: Stand with feet hip-width, dumbbells at sides, palms facing in. Slight elbow bend, core braced.
description.movement: Raise arms out to sides until parallel with floor. Lead with elbows slightly. Lower with control.
description.cues: Lead with elbows, stop at shoulder height, control descent, no swinging

description.overview: An isolation exercise raising dumbbells forward to shoulder height. Targets anterior deltoids for front shoulder development.
description.setup: Stand with feet hip-width, dumbbells at thighs, palms facing body. Slight elbow bend, core braced.
description.movement: Raise dumbbells forward to shoulder height, maintaining slight elbow bend. Lower with control without swinging.
description.cues: Stop at shoulder height, control descent, no momentum, alternate or together

description.overview: A chest press variation squeezing dumbbells together throughout movement. Maximizes pec activation through constant inward tension.
description.setup: Lie on bench, dumbbells touching at chest with neutral grip. Press dumbbells together hard throughout exercise.
description.movement: Press dumbbells up while maintaining inward squeezing pressure. Fully extend arms at top. Lower with constant squeeze.
description.cues: Squeeze together constantly, press and squeeze, maintain tension, feel the chest

description.overview: A hip hinge movement with dumbbells targeting hamstrings and glutes. Essential posterior chain exercise teaching proper hip hinge pattern.
description.setup: Stand with feet hip-width, dumbbells in front of thighs. Soft knee bend, chest up, shoulders back.
description.movement: Hinge at hips, pushing them back while lowering dumbbells along legs. Feel hamstring stretch. Drive hips forward to stand.
description.cues: Push hips back, slight knee bend, flat back, squeeze glutes at top

description.overview: A wide-stance squat holding dumbbell between legs. Emphasizes inner thighs and glutes with deep squat position.
description.setup: Wide stance, toes pointed out 45 degrees. Hold dumbbell with both hands between legs. Chest up, core braced.
description.movement: Push hips back and squat down between legs. Descend to depth, knees tracking toes. Drive through heels to stand.
description.cues: Knees track toes, sit deep, chest stays up, squeeze glutes at top

description.overview: A squat variation holding single dumbbell at chest goblet-style. Perfect for learning squat mechanics and building lower body strength.
description.setup: Hold dumbbell vertically at chest, cupping one end. Feet shoulder-width, toes slightly out. Core braced.
description.movement: Push hips back and squat down, keeping chest up and elbows inside knees. Descend to depth. Drive through heels to stand.
description.cues: Elbows inside knees, chest up, sit between feet, squeeze glutes at top

description.overview: A hip thrust using dumbbell resistance for glute development. Primary glute builder with full hip extension emphasis.
description.setup: Upper back on bench, feet flat on floor hip-width apart. Dumbbell on hip crease, hands securing it.
description.movement: Drive through heels to lift hips until body is straight from shoulders to knees. Squeeze glutes hard at top. Lower with control.
description.cues: Drive through heels, squeeze glutes hard, chin tucked, don't hyperextend

description.overview: A squat variation with dumbbells held at shoulders in front rack position. Emphasizes quads and core while teaching upright squat mechanics.
description.setup: Stand with feet shoulder-width, dumbbells at shoulders, elbows high. Core braced, chest up.
description.movement: Push hips back and squat down, keeping chest up and elbows high. Descend to parallel or below. Drive through heels to stand.
description.cues: Elbows up, chest proud, sit between legs, drive through heels

description.overview: A standing oblique exercise lowering dumbbell along leg. Targets obliques through lateral flexion for core development.
description.setup: Stand with feet shoulder-width, dumbbell in one hand at side. Other hand on hip or behind head. Stand tall.
description.movement: Lower dumbbell along leg by bending sideways at waist. Feel stretch in opposite oblique. Return to upright by contracting obliques.
description.cues: Bend sideways only, no twisting, feel the stretch, control both directions

description.overview: A rotational core exercise swinging dumbbell diagonally across body. Builds rotational power for sports and functional strength.
description.setup: Stand with feet wider than shoulder-width. Hold dumbbell with both hands. Start with dumbbell outside one hip.
description.movement: Rotate torso, swinging dumbbell diagonally up and across body to opposite shoulder. Control return to start. Complete reps then switch.
description.cues: Rotate from core, pivot feet, diagonal path, control the swing

description.overview: A dead bug variation holding dumbbell for added anti-extension challenge. Builds core stability while coordinating opposite arm and leg movement.
description.setup: Lie on back, hold one dumbbell with both hands overhead. Knees bent at 90 degrees, shins parallel to floor. Low back pressed down.
description.movement: Lower opposite arm (with dumbbell) and leg toward floor while maintaining low back contact. Return to start and switch sides.
description.cues: Low back glued down, opposite arm and leg, controlled extension, breathe out as you lower

description.overview: A plank variation pulling dumbbell from side to side under body. Anti-rotation core exercise building stability and shoulder endurance.
description.setup: High plank position with dumbbell outside one hand. Feet wide for stability. Core braced, hips level.
description.movement: Reach under body with opposite hand to pull dumbbell to other side. Return hand to plank. Repeat to other side.
description.cues: Hips stay level, minimize rotation, wide feet, controlled pulls

description.overview: An explosive clean starting from hang position at thighs. Develops hip power and clean technique with lighter load than full clean.
description.setup: Stand with dumbbells at thighs, slight knee bend. Chest up, shoulders over dumbbells.
description.movement: Dip slightly then explosively extend hips, shrugging and pulling dumbbells up body. Catch at shoulders with fast elbows. Lower to hang.
description.cues: Short dip, explosive hip drive, fast elbows under, soft catch at shoulders

description.overview: A combination exercise pairing reverse lunge with bicep curl. Builds lower body strength and arm development in efficient compound movement.
description.setup: Stand with dumbbells at sides, palms facing in. Feet hip-width, core braced.
description.movement: Step back into reverse lunge while curling dumbbells. At bottom of lunge, biceps are contracted. Push back to start while lowering dumbbells.
description.cues: Step back and curl together, knee hovers, push through front heel, lower curl as you stand

description.overview: Single-arm overhead press challenging core stability. Builds unilateral strength while forcing anti-lateral flexion.
description.setup: One dumbbell at shoulder height. Free hand can be on hip or at side. Core maximally engaged.
description.movement: Press one dumbbell overhead while resisting lean. Core works overtime to maintain vertical position.
description.cues: Don't lean, core on fire, press straight up, feel the anti-lean challenge

description.overview: Single-arm dumbbell row for unilateral back development. Allows heavy loading with stability and eliminates compensation.
description.setup: One hand and knee on bench, other foot planted wide. Dumbbell hanging straight down from working arm.
description.movement: Row dumbbell to hip focusing on lat contraction. Minimize rotation. Feel strong lat squeeze at top.
description.cues: Hand to hip, no rotation, lat does the work, pause and squeeze at top

description.overview: Fundamental cardiovascular exercise that builds aerobic endurance, burns calories, and improves overall conditioning. One of the most accessible cardio activities.
description.setup: Comfortable running shoes, appropriate clothing. Start on flat terrain. Begin with walk or light jog to warm up.
description.movement: Maintain steady pace, landing midfoot. Arms swing naturally opposite to legs. Breathe rhythmically, in through nose, out through mouth.
description.cues: Light feet, relaxed shoulders, steady breathing, eyes forward

description.overview: Low-intensity steady-state cardiovascular exercise. Perfect for building aerobic base, active recovery, or beginners starting their fitness journey.
description.setup: Comfortable running shoes, flat surface preferred. Start with 5-minute walking warm-up.
description.movement: Maintain conversational pace where you can talk but not sing. Short strides, relaxed form. Breathe naturally.
description.cues: Easy pace, stay relaxed, breathe comfortably, enjoy the movement

description.overview: Low-impact cardiovascular exercise that builds leg strength and endurance while being easy on joints. Great for all fitness levels.
description.setup: Adjust seat height so leg has slight bend at bottom of pedal stroke. Hands comfortable on handlebars.
description.movement: Pedal in smooth circles, applying power through the entire rotation. Maintain steady cadence, adjusting resistance as needed.
description.cues: Smooth circles, steady cadence, core engaged, relax grip

description.overview: Indoor cycling for controlled cardiovascular training. Allows precise intensity control and eliminates weather as a factor.
description.setup: Adjust seat height and handlebar position. Seat level with hip when standing beside bike.
description.movement: Pedal with consistent cadence. Vary resistance for different training zones. Maintain upright posture.
description.cues: Pedal through heel, steady rhythm, adjust resistance, stay seated

description.overview: Full-body cardiovascular exercise engaging legs, back, and arms. Low impact with high caloric burn and excellent conditioning benefits.
description.setup: Feet secured in footplates. Grip handle with relaxed overhand grip. Sit tall with arms extended.
description.movement: Drive with legs first, then lean back slightly, finally pull handle to lower ribs. Return in reverse order: arms, body, legs.
description.cues: Legs-back-arms, arms-back-legs, drive through heels, long strokes

description.overview: High-intensity cardiovascular exercise that improves coordination, footwork, and conditioning. Burns significant calories in short time.
description.setup: Rope length: handles should reach armpits when standing on rope center. Elbows close to sides.
description.movement: Jump with small hops, just high enough for rope to pass. Wrists rotate the rope, not arms. Land softly on balls of feet.
description.cues: Small jumps, quick wrists, light landings, stay relaxed

description.overview: Advanced jump rope skill where rope passes under feet twice per jump. Develops explosive power, coordination, and cardiovascular endurance.
description.setup: Master regular jump rope first. Rope may need to be slightly shorter. Wrists must be very fast.
description.movement: Jump slightly higher than single unders. Rotate wrists twice as fast. Stay tight and compact.
description.cues: Higher jump, faster wrists, stay tight, core engaged

description.overview: Functional cardiovascular exercise using stairs or stair machine. Builds leg strength and endurance while mimicking daily activities.
description.setup: Find staircase or use stair climber machine. Start at moderate pace. Can use handrails for balance initially.
description.movement: Step up fully onto each stair. Drive through heel of working leg. Maintain upright posture.
description.cues: Full steps, drive through heels, stand tall, steady pace

description.overview: Low-impact full-body cardiovascular exercise. Provides running-like motion without impact stress on joints.
description.setup: Step onto pedals, grip handles. Adjust resistance and incline as desired. Stand tall.
description.movement: Push and pull with legs and arms in coordinated motion. Maintain steady rhythm. Keep core engaged.
description.cues: Smooth motion, core engaged, stand tall, use arms actively

description.overview: Zero-impact full-body cardiovascular exercise. Excellent for joint health while building endurance and overall conditioning.
description.setup: Pool with appropriate depth. Comfortable swimwear and goggles. Warm up with easy laps.
description.movement: Choose stroke (freestyle, breaststroke, backstroke). Maintain consistent pace. Focus on technique and breathing rhythm.
description.cues: Streamlined body, rhythmic breathing, smooth strokes, relaxed but purposeful

description.overview: High-intensity conditioning exercise using heavy ropes. Develops shoulder endurance, core stability, and cardiovascular fitness.
description.setup: Anchor rope at center point. Stand in athletic stance facing anchor. Grip rope ends with palms down.
description.movement: Create waves by alternating arms up and down. Maintain athletic stance. Core stays braced throughout.
description.cues: Athletic stance, powerful waves, core tight, breathe rhythmically

description.overview: Full-body air bike combining arm and leg work. Known for brutal conditioning due to increased resistance with more effort.
description.setup: Adjust seat height. Grip handles firmly. Feet secure on pedals. Start at moderate pace.
description.movement: Push and pull with arms while pedaling legs. Coordinate upper and lower body. Increase effort for more resistance.
description.cues: Arms and legs together, push through resistance, pace yourself, full effort

description.overview: Upper-body focused cardiovascular machine mimicking cross-country skiing. Excellent for developing lat endurance and conditioning.
description.setup: Stand facing machine. Grip handles with palms down. Slight bend in knees, hinge forward at hips.
description.movement: Pull handles down forcefully while hinging deeper. Return with control. Focus on powerful lat engagement.
description.cues: Drive with lats, hinge at hips, explosive pull, controlled return

description.overview: High-intensity interval training alternating between maximum effort sprints and recovery periods. Builds speed, power, and metabolic conditioning.
description.setup: Flat, safe running surface. Adequate warm-up of 10 minutes light cardio and dynamic stretches.
description.movement: Sprint at maximum effort for prescribed time. Recover with walking or light jogging. Repeat for prescribed sets.
description.cues: Max effort on sprints, full recovery between, pump arms, drive knees

description.overview: Sprint training on an incline for increased intensity and power development. Builds explosive leg power and cardiovascular capacity.
description.setup: Find moderate hill (6-10% grade). Mark start and finish points. Thorough warm-up required.
description.movement: Sprint up hill at maximum effort. Walk back down for recovery. Focus on driving knees high and pumping arms.
description.cues: Drive knees up, pump arms, stay forward, attack the hill

description.overview: Passive hanging from pull-up bar to decompress spine, build grip strength, and stretch shoulders. Foundation for all bar exercises.
description.setup: Grip pull-up bar with overhand grip shoulder-width apart. Step off or jump to hang position.
description.movement: Allow body to hang relaxed with arms fully extended. Let shoulders elevate toward ears. Breathe deeply and relax.
description.cues: Relax everything, breathe deep, let gravity decompress, grip bar firmly

description.overview: Engaged hanging position with shoulders packed down and back. Develops scapular control and prepares for pulling movements.
description.setup: Start in dead hang position. Grip pull-up bar with overhand grip.
description.movement: Without bending elbows, pull shoulder blades down and back. Elevate chest slightly. Hold engaged position.
description.cues: Shoulders away from ears, chest up, squeeze back, arms stay straight

description.overview: Advanced isometric hold with legs extended parallel to ground. Develops extreme core and hip flexor strength plus pressing endurance.
description.setup: Hands on parallettes, dip bars, or floor. Arms locked out straight. Shoulders depressed.
description.movement: Lift legs to parallel with floor, keeping knees straight. Push hard through hands. Hold position with locked legs.
description.cues: Lock knees, point toes, push floor away, compress torso

description.overview: Regression of L-Sit with knees tucked to chest. Develops core and hip flexor strength while building toward full L-Sit.
description.setup: Hands on parallettes, dip bars, or floor. Arms locked out straight. Shoulders depressed.
description.movement: Lift knees toward chest, keeping them tight to body. Push hard through hands. Hold tucked position.
description.cues: Knees to chest, push floor away, round upper back, shoulders down

description.overview: Posterior chain isometric hold strengthening lower back and glutes. Essential gymnastics conditioning and spinal health exercise.
description.setup: Lie face down on mat. Arms extended overhead. Legs straight together.
description.movement: Lift arms and legs simultaneously off ground. Squeeze glutes and lower back. Hold arch position.
description.cues: Lift arms and legs, squeeze glutes, look at floor, breathe

description.overview: Full-body posterior chain isometric strengthening lower back, glutes, and shoulders. Builds spinal erector endurance.
description.setup: Lie face down on mat. Arms extended overhead, palms down. Legs straight.
description.movement: Simultaneously lift arms, chest, and legs off ground. Squeeze entire posterior chain. Hold elevated position.
description.cues: Lift everything, squeeze glutes, reach long, look at floor

description.overview: Isometric hip extension hold targeting glutes and hamstrings. Develops hip strength and stability in extended position.
description.setup: Lie on back, knees bent, feet flat on floor hip-width apart. Arms at sides.
description.movement: Drive hips toward ceiling by squeezing glutes. Hold at top with straight line from shoulders to knees.
description.cues: Squeeze glutes hard, hips to ceiling, knees over ankles, breathe

description.overview: Traditional martial arts isometric squat hold. Develops leg endurance, mental toughness, and lower body stability.
description.setup: Wide stance, feet parallel or slightly turned out. Weight evenly distributed. Arms extended forward or on hips.
description.movement: Sink into deep squat position, thighs parallel to floor. Knees track over toes. Hold position.
description.cues: Sink low, knees out, weight in heels, stay tall, breathe

description.overview: Vertical pulling exercise with supinated (underhand) grip emphasizing biceps. Slightly easier than pull-ups for most people.
description.setup: Grip bar with palms facing you, hands shoulder-width apart. Hang with arms fully extended.
description.movement: Pull body up until chin clears bar, focusing on biceps and back. Lower with control.
description.cues: Pull elbows down, chin over bar, squeeze biceps, control descent

description.overview: Pull-up variation with palms facing each other. Most shoulder-friendly grip, works lats and biceps evenly.
description.setup: Grip parallel handles with palms facing each other. Hang with arms fully extended.
description.movement: Pull body up until chin clears handle level. Focus on lat engagement. Lower with control.
description.cues: Elbows to ribs, squeeze lats, chin up, controlled negative

description.overview: Advanced calisthenics movement transitioning from pull-up to dip. Requires significant pulling power and technique.
description.setup: Grip bar with overhand grip slightly wider than pull-ups. Start from dead hang. False grip optional.
description.movement: Explosive pull-up followed by aggressive lean forward. Transition chest over bar. Press to straight arms.
description.cues: Explosive pull, aggressive lean, chest over bar, push to lockout

description.overview: Hanging core exercise bringing toes to touch the bar. Develops hip flexor and core strength with active shoulder engagement.
description.setup: Hang from pull-up bar with arms extended. Engage shoulders by slightly pulling down.
description.movement: Swing legs up while compressing torso. Touch toes to bar between hands. Lower with control.
description.cues: Compress hard, toes to bar, active shoulders, control descent

description.overview: Core exercise hanging from bar, driving knees toward chest. Develops hip flexor and lower ab strength.
description.setup: Hang from pull-up bar with arms extended. Engage shoulders slightly. Legs together.
description.movement: Raise knees toward chest by flexing hips. Hold briefly at top. Lower with control.
description.cues: Knees to chest, minimize swing, pause at top, slow negative

description.overview: Activation exercise focusing on scapular depression and retraction. Develops shoulder stability and pull-up strength.
description.setup: Hang from pull-up bar with arms extended, shoulders relaxed toward ears.
description.movement: Without bending elbows, pull shoulder blades down and together. Elevate body slightly. Return to start.
description.cues: Arms stay straight, shoulders down and back, lift chest, squeeze at top

description.overview: Advanced eccentric hamstring exercise. One of the most effective exercises for hamstring strength and injury prevention.
description.setup: Kneel on pad with ankles secured under bar or held by partner. Body tall, core engaged.
description.movement: Lower body forward under control using only hamstrings. Catch yourself with hands, push back up.
description.cues: Stay tall, control the descent, hamstrings on fire, push back to start

description.overview: Knee-dominant squat variation isolating quadriceps. Provides intense quad stretch and contraction.
description.setup: Stand holding support for balance. Rise onto toes. Lean back slightly.
description.movement: Lower by bending knees forward while leaning torso back. Keep hips extended. Rise by straightening knees.
description.cues: Knees forward, lean back, stay on toes, squeeze quads

description.overview: Advanced vertical pressing movement using body weight. Builds significant shoulder and tricep strength.
description.setup: Kick up to handstand against wall. Hands slightly wider than shoulder-width. Arms locked out.
description.movement: Lower head toward floor by bending elbows. Press back to straight arms. Keep core tight throughout.
description.cues: Elbows track back, head to floor, press strong, stay tight

description.overview: Vertical pressing exercise targeting chest, triceps, and shoulders. Can be performed on parallel bars or rings.
description.setup: Support body on parallel bars or rings with arms locked out. Shoulders down, core engaged.
description.movement: Lower body by bending elbows until upper arms parallel to floor. Press back to lockout.
description.cues: Lean forward for chest, upright for triceps, control descent, full lockout
